title: Bug 103963 - Friendly error message not displayed when there is no data for a series
OB: When trying to preview the series, no error message is displayed when there is no data available for that series.
EB: A friendly error message should be displayed when there is no data available for a series while trying to preview it.
SR:
1. Create a series without any data.
2. Try to preview the series.
3. Verify that a friendly error message is displayed indicating there is no data available for the series.
